song_lyrics: He Pramukh Swāmī āp ke ham charaṇme vandan kare,
Gurudev Hari ke sāth sumiran āpakā ahonish kare... 1
Vo āp ke dvārā prakaṭ hai mokṣha hit brahmānḍme,
Jo āpakī letā sharaṇ, vo shānti sukh urme bhare, he Pramukh Swāmī... 2
Hai āp Akṣharbrahma māyāpār tattva jīse kahā,
Brahmānḍme hai āpakā sankalp kāryānvit rahā,
Karuṇā kṛupāse āpakī sab jīv bhavsāgar tare, he Pramukh Swāmī... 3
Kalidoṣh durguṇ se bachākar godme ham ko līyā,
Harpal nibhāye mātṛusam vātsalyakā varṣhan kīyā,
Varadān aisā dījīye, ham āp ke path anusare, he Pramukh Swāmī... 4
Īs deh akṣharrūp ho Haricharaṇ sevāme ṭhare,
Agyān māyāghan haṭākar gyān sūrya prakaṭ kare,
Tum ajanmā ke janam-din yah prārthanā ham uchchare, he Pramukh Swāmī... 5
title: He Pramukh Swāmī āp ke ham charaṇme vandan kare

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
